title: Composing a plot for your scenario
Key lessons for adapting scenario planning in diversified companies
Decisions in clinical management: A case scenario
An energy consumption scenario for sizing rural electrification PV systems
container-title: Progress in Photovoltaics: Research and Applications
items.abstract: <jats:title>Abstract</jats:title><jats:p>This paper submits a systematic analysis of user consumption patterns of several photovoltaic (PV)‐powered rural dwellings in a Mediterranean area of Spain. the measurements have been carried out within the framework of two projects and assessed in contrast with other experiences. This analysis allows a consumption scenario developed previsouly to be tested by means of the classification of families according to the number and age of their members into three types—extended, mean and reduced—with the aim of establishing a few standard cases of optimization for sizing purposes.</jats:p><jats:p>Because the use of AC current is indispensable, at least for domestic appliances, the scenario hereby proposed leads to PV system sizes of 160, 320 and 480 Wp for reduced, mean and extended families, respectively, enjoying a level of comfort similar to grid‐conneced systems.</jats:p>

title: ChemInform Abstract: A New Mechanistic Scenario for the Photochemical Transformation of Ergosterol: An MC‐SCF and MM‐VB Study.
items.abstract: <jats:title>Abstract</jats:title><jats:p>ChemInform is a weekly Abstracting Service, delivering concise information at a glance that was extracted from about 100 leading journals. To access a ChemInform Abstract of an article which was published elsewhere, please select a “Full Text” option. The original article is trackable via the “References” option.</jats:p>

title: Relativistic potentials for a counterstreaming nuclear-matter scenario with a covariant momentum-dependent interaction
